import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Form, Button, Input, Message, Checkbox } from 'semantic-ui-react' import Layout from '../components/Layout' import FileSaver from 'file-saver' import { network } from '../src/web3.js' import config from '../config.json' const CONFIG_FILE_PATH = './config.json' class Settings extends Component { state = { liquidatorAddress: sessionStorage.getItem('liquidatorAddress'), addressToLiquidate: sessionStorage.getItem('addressToLiquidate'), collateralAddress: sessionStorage.getItem('collateralAddress'), repayTokenAddress: sessionStorage.getItem('repayTokenAddress'), lpAddressProviderAddress: sessionStorage.getItem( 'lpAddressProviderAddress' ), lpAddress: sessionStorage.getItem('lpAddress'), latestLpCoreAddress: sessionStorage.getItem('latestLpCoreAddress'), wss: sessionStorage.getItem('wss'), http: sessionStorage.getItem('http'), mnemonic: sessionStorage.getItem('mnemonic'), ethGasStationAPIKey: sessionStorage.getItem('ethGasStationAPIKey'), dynamicGasPrice: sessionStorage.getItem('dynamicGasPrice'), liquidationAmount: sessionStorage.getItem('liquidationAmount'), gasPrice: sessionStorage.getItem('gasPrice'), gasLimit: sessionStorage.getItem('gasLimit'), receiveATokens: sessionStorage.getItem('receiveATokens'), errorMessage: '', } onSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault() console.log(this.state) var configFile = { liquidatorAddress: this.state.liquidatorAddress, addressToLiquidate: this.state.addressToLiquidate, collateralAddress: this.state.collateralAddress, repayTokenAddress: this.state.repayTokenAddress, lpAddressProviderAddress: this.state.lpAddressProviderAddress, lpAddress: this.state.lpAddress, latestLpCoreAddress: this.state.latestLpCoreAddress, wss: this.state.wss, http: this.state.http, mnemonic: this.state.mnemonic, ethGasStationAPIKey: this.state.ethGasStationAPIKey, dynamicGasPrice: this.state.dynamicGasPrice, liquidationAmount: this.state.liquidationAmount, gasPrice: this.state.gasPrice, gasLimit: this.state.gasLimit, receiveATokens: this.state.receiveATokens, } var blob = new Blob([JSON.stringify(configFile)], { type: 'application/json', }) FileSaver.saveAs(blob, 'settings.json') sessionStorage.setItem('liquidatorAddress', this.state.liquidatorAddress) sessionStorage.setItem('addressToLiquidate', this.state.addressToLiquidate) sessionStorage.setItem('collateralAddress', this.state.collateralAddress) sessionStorage.setItem('repayTokenAddress', this.state.repayTokenAddress) sessionStorage.setItem( 'lpAddressProviderAddress', this.state.lpAddressProviderAddress ) sessionStorage.setItem('lpAddress', this.state.lpAddress) sessionStorage.setItem( 'latestLpCoreAddress', this.state.latestLpCoreAddress ) sessionStorage.setItem('wss', this.state.wss) sessionStorage.setItem('http', this.state.http) sessionStorage.setItem('mnemonic', this.state.mnemonic) sessionStorage.setItem( 'ethGasStationAPIKey', this.state.ethGasStationAPIKey ) sessionStorage.setItem('dynamicGasPrice', this.state.dynamicGasPrice) sessionStorage.setItem('liquidationAmount', this.state.liquidationAmount) sessionStorage.setItem('gasPrice', this.state.gasPrice) sessionStorage.setItem('gasLimit', this.state.gasLimit) sessionStorage.setItem('receiveATokens', this.state.receiveATokens) } hiddenFileInput = React.createRef() uploadSettings = () => { this.hiddenFileInput.current.click() } readSettings = (event) => { var fileUploaded = event.target.files[0] var fr = new FileReader() fr.onload = (e) => { var result = JSON.parse(e.target.result) this.setState({ liquidatorAddress: result.liquidatorAddress, addressToLiquidate: result.addressToLiquidate, collateralAddress: result.collateralAddress, repayTokenAddress: result.repayTokenAddress, lpAddressProviderAddress: result.lpAddressProviderAddress, lpAddress: result.lpAddress, latestLpCoreAddress: result.latestLpCoreAddress, wss: result.wss, http: result.http, mnemonic: result.mnemonic, ethGasStationAPIKey: result.ethGasStationAPIKey, dynamicGasPrice: result.dynamicGasPrice, liquidationAmount: result.liquidationAmount, gasPrice: result.gasPrice, gasLimit: result.gasLimit, receiveATokens: result.receiveATokens, }) var formatted = JSON.stringify(result, null, 2) console.log(formatted) } fr.readAsText(fileUploaded) } render() { return (

Liquidation Settings

this.setState({ liquidatorAddress: event.target.value }) } /> this.setState({ addressToLiquidate: event.target.value }) } /> this.setState({ collateralAddress: event.target.value }) } /> this.setState({ repayTokenAddress: event.target.value }) } /> this.setState({ lpAddressProviderAddress: event.target.value, }) } /> this.setState({ lpAddress: event.target.value }) } /> this.setState({ latestLpCoreAddress: event.target.value }) } /> this.setState({ wss: event.target.value })} /> this.setState({ http: event.target.value }) } /> this.setState({ mnemonic: event.target.value }) } /> this.setState({ liquidationAmount: event.target.value }) } /> this.setState({ gasLimit: event.target.value }) } /> this.setState({ ethGasStationAPIKey: event.target.value }) } /> this.setState({ gasPrice: event.target.value }) } /> this.setState(({ dynamicGasPrice }) => ({ dynamicGasPrice: !dynamicGasPrice, })) } /> this.setState(({ receiveATokens }) => ({ receiveATokens: !receiveATokens, })) } />
